website_summaries.verdict: Desired for its clean and simple silhouette, the Nike SB Check Solarsoft Canvas is even more recognized for its performance in the park. Users are impressed with the supportive comfort the drop-in insoles supplied. Aside from its cushy feel, the insoles also offered enhanced protection and excellent board feel.Non-skaters are also pleased with its overall look and comfort. Satisfied customers chose to buy another pair.
pros: Many reviewers find the Nike SB Check Solarsoft Canvas sneaker as attractive
Both skaters and non-skaters have agreed that this kind of Nike sneakers is perfect for everyday wear
The SB Check Solarsoft Canvas is praised a lot for its thick, spongy and supportive insole that offered enhanced comfort underfoot
Others think that the padded collar is a great addition
One skater likes that the metal grommets on the top eyelets of these kicks as it helped protect the laces from snapping or ripping
The low-top Nike SB Check Solarsoft Canvas looks exactly as advertised, revealed by a handful of buyers
Pleased with its performance in the park, another user has stated this shoe from the Nike SB collection is recommended for beginner and experienced skaters alike
It is sold at a budget-friendly price point
cons: A small number has complained about the shoe’s narrow and tight construction
A skater has used the SB Check Solarsoft Canvas for longboarding and is disappointed that the soles wore out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Number 1
customer_reviews.text: Love these Nike trainers so much this is my second pair........very smart, comfortable and well made as always. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rozzenation

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the Granpa-heirs
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these as they aren't very good and I would rather buy some Prada granpa-heirs.
customer_reviews.author: Marvellous

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are very good! My boyfriend skateboards almost every day and they have held out amazingly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike SB are the best
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best shoes. There's no doubt about it other than Nike SBs being the most comfortable foot hugging shoe I've ever worn. Bought the same shoes every year for the last 4 years. Best shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Bit narrow but good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good product and nice shoe; but right width wise. VERY slow delivery
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: They fit / look great and arrived in good time!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, the most comfortable pair of shoes I’ve ever owned. Great for a casual look too.
customer_reviews.author: Cory James

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers :-)
customer_reviews.text: Size 8 in Adidas gazelles which were slightly tight so ordered 8.5 UK & size is fine. Bought from shoezoo UK. Just over £50 for a pair of really nice trainers, plus the delivery was fast considering it was sent from California. It actually took more time in the UK to work its way up the country than it did California>UK :-D Will be ordering another pair of shoes from this seller, just a different design :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rabit

customer_reviews.title: modernist look....
customer_reviews.text: Love these all black trainers....... More versatile and stylish with jeans etc than overtly sporty numbers ha! I take size 8 normally, but this 7.5 was just fine....... Great quality from Nike thanks amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Rozzenation

customer_reviews.title: Not long life!
customer_reviews.text: They have split and have a hole in the sole after only a short time considering their cost I would have expected longer life!
customer_reviews.author: mrs t j allen

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Not happy that I wanted to return ,thought a credit would make a trainer which was too small fit .then had to ask twice to get a return ,not what you need.
customer_reviews.author: C. Busbridge

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Sb Check Solar CNVS Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike SB Check Solarsoft Canvas Skateboarding Shoe is designed for natural comfort on the table and in your free time thanks to the lightweight upper and ultra-soft insole for maximum impact protection.
